    • Highlights

    • Immerse in the vibrant culture of Meghalaya through the Wari Chora festival.
    • Experience the breathtaking landscapes of Cherrapunji and its living root bridges.
    • Discover local cuisine, crafts, and traditions of the Khasi people.
    • Explore the serene beauty of Shillong and surrounding areas.

    Wari Chora Special - 4 Nights / 5 Days

    Day 1: Arrival in Shillong

    • Arrive in Shillong and transfer to your hotel.
    • Explore local markets and enjoy traditional Khasi cuisine.
    • Relax at Umiam Lake in the evening.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Shillong.

    Day 2: Shillong to Cherrapunji

    • After breakfast, drive to Cherrapunji.
    • Visit Nohkalikai Falls and Mawsmai Cave.
    • Engage in activities related to the Wari Chora festival.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Cherrapunji.

    Day 3: Wari Chora Festival Experience

    • Full day participation in the Wari Chora festival activities.
    • Enjoy traditional music, dance, and food from local vendors.
    • Interact with local artisans and learn about traditional crafts.
    • Return to the hotel for an overnight stay in Cherrapunji.

    Day 4: Cherrapunji Sightseeing

    • Explore the living root bridges and trek to the Double-Decker Bridge.
    • Visit local waterfalls and enjoy scenic views of the Khasi hills.
    • Return to Shillong for an overnight stay.

    Day 5: Departure from Shillong

    • After breakfast, check out from the hotel.
    • Transfer to the airport or railway station for your onward journey.
    • End of the Wari Chora Special Tour.
